title: The Meadow
lyrics:
We went to the meadow
No walls, no ads, no black balloons
Waving from the chain link fence
No bricks, no windows
Except for the two gold ones
You showed me, my friend

We went to the meadow



And we knew it wouldn't last

It was beautiful



We went to the meadow

No fear, no confusion, just a sliver of a moon

Cheering us from out in the blue

No hate, just springâ€™s young light green leaves

Showing us what life can do

We went to the meadow

We went to the meadow



And we knew it wouldn't last

It was beautiful

We knew it wouldn't last

It was beautiful



We went to the meadow

We went to the meadow
